attributes.action: pass legislation to allow voters to dismiss Boris Johnson as Mayor of London and allow the election of someone who has the interests of all Londoners at heart
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Boris Johnson was elected by the suburbs to serve their interests above the interests of all Londoners.  In America the electorate can "recall" their governors if they feel that they are not performing well.  Let's get legislation in place to remove the current mayor before he destroys London completely

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the GLA.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
